product_overview: Orbis is a React/Tailwind single-page app that consolidates dashboard summaries, an AI-powered chat assistant, task management, and finance tracking for authenticated users. The frontend uses state-based routing and includes integrations for AI providers and local web search actions.
core_goals: Provide a single-pane dashboard overview of tasks, habits, and finances for authenticated users.
Offer an AI-powered Chat Assistant that can use external providers (with API key management), perform web searches, and suggest local actions.
Allow users to create, update, complete, and filter tasks quickly.
Enable users to log financial records and view aggregated finance data and charts.
Keep the UX responsive with smooth animations and clear error handling despite state-based routing limitations.

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Displays a high-level overview of tasks, habits, and finances so users can see their current status at a glance.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> See Dashboard load -> View overview cards -> Click an overview card -> See expanded details for that area
Navigate to / -> Not authenticated -> See authentication required message -> Be redirected or prompted to login

features.name: Chat Assistant
features.description: AI-powered assistant UI that lets users choose an AI provider, supply an API key, send messages, trigger web searches, and confirm/cancel suggested local actions.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Chat in sidebar -> Select AI Provider 'Claude' -> Enter API Key -> Click Save API Key -> Type message in chat input -> Click Send message -> See AI response appear in chat -> Review suggested actions -> Click Confirm suggested action -> See confirmation that the action was executed or queued

Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Chat in sidebar -> Select AI Provider -> Enter API Key -> Click Save API Key -> Enter query and click Send message -> See suggestion to Trigger manual web search -> Click Trigger manual web search -> See web search results appended to the chat
Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Chat in sidebar -> Select AI Provider -> Enter invalid API Key -> Click Save API Key -> See API key validation error message -> Correct or remove API Key
Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Chat in sidebar -> Type message -> Click Send message -> See provider/network error -> See actionable error message suggesting retry or changing AI Provider

features.name: Task Management
features.description: Create, update, mark complete, and filter tasks so users can manage their to-dos within the application.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Tasks in sidebar -> Click Add new task -> Fill task title field -> Click Save -> See new task appear in task list
Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Tasks in sidebar -> See task list -> Click Mark task as complete on a task -> See task state update to completed and UI indicate completion
Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Tasks in sidebar -> Select a filter option -> See task list update according to the chosen filter
Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Tasks in sidebar -> Click Add new task -> Leave required fields empty -> Click Save -> See validation error message preventing save
Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Tasks in sidebar -> Click Add new task -> Fill task fields -> Click Save -> Network error occurs -> See error message and retry option

features.name: Finance Tracking
features.description: Log and view income/expense records and see aggregated finance visuals to help users track money flows.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Financas in sidebar -> Click Add finance record -> Fill amount field -> Fill category field -> Click Save to log finance record -> See new record in ledger -> See updated finance charts
Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Financas in sidebar -> View finance list and charts -> Click a record -> See record details

Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Financas in sidebar -> Click Add finance record -> Enter invalid amount (non-numeric or negative) -> Click Save to log finance record -> See validation error and prevent save

Navigate to / -> Be authenticated -> Click Financas in sidebar -> Click Add finance record -> Fill fields -> Click Save to log finance record -> Network error occurs -> See error message and option to retry
